tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE engagement_rate (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    post_count INT,
    like_count INT,
    comment_count INT,
    engagement_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE strategy_effectiveness (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(255),
    engagement_rate FLOAT,
    effectiveness_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE follower_growth (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT,
    date DATE,
    new_followers INT,
    total_followers INT
);

CREATE TABLE engagement_rates (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT,
    date DATE,
    likes INT,
    shares INT,
    comments INT
);

CREATE TABLE strategy_effectiveness (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT,
    date DATE,
    engagement_score FLOAT,
    growth_rate FLOAT
);
